title: Launched the Change Log
description: A central hub to track all major changes across Zim Developers projects. Stay informed on what's new, what's improved, and what's coming next.

title: New Ranking System
description: Introduced a community ranking system that rewards active contributors. Climb through ranks from Contributor to Ambassador and unlock access to more projects.

title: Redesigned Landing Page
description: Completely overhauled the Xfinity Pros landing page with a modern, clean design focused on conversion and clarity. New hero section, testimonials, and pricing layout.

title: Introduced Search Engine
description: IBZIM now has a fully functional search engine, making it easier than ever to find exactly what you need across the platform.

title: Added Daily Devotional Feature
description: Users can now receive a curated daily devotional directly on the homepage. Each devotional includes scripture references and a short reflection.

title: Search Performance Improvements
description: Optimized the search indexing pipeline for faster results. Average query response time reduced by 40%. Also improved result relevance scoring.

title: Registered as a Company
description: ibzim.com is now officially registered as a company. A huge milestone for the platform and the team behind it.

title: Cart & Checkout Flow
description: Implemented the full shopping cart and checkout experience. Users can now add products, manage quantities, and complete purchases through a streamlined flow.

title: Landed a New Client
description: We designed a website for Moddong Investments.

title: Security Audit Completed
description: Completed a comprehensive security audit of the banking platform. Implemented additional encryption layers and improved session management across all endpoints.
